name: image-upscaler
description: AI-powered image upscaling and enhancement via provider client
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: image_upscaler
toolDefinition.description: AI-powered image upscaling and enhancement. Upscale images, enhance quality (denoise + sharpen), get image info, list available models, and check job status. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK).

action.description: upscale (upscale an image), enhance (denoise + sharpen an image), get_info (get image metadata), list_models (list available upscaling models), check_status (check processing job status)

image.description: Image file path or URL. Required for upscale, enhance, and get_info.

scale.description: Upscale factor (2, 3, or 4). Optional for upscale, defaults to 2.

format.description: Output image format. Optional for upscale, defaults to "png".

denoise_level.description: Denoise intensity level (0-3). Optional for enhance, defaults to 1.

sharpen.description: Whether to apply sharpening. Optional for enhance, defaults to true.

jobId.description: Job ID for status checking. Required for check_status.
